content: 18 d skip the first 2 st s single_crochet x 6 slip_stitch in the next st of round 11 you will now work the window so leave the end of round 6 alone chain 1 and bind off 6 for a minute and work the window as follows 12 now take up the coloured yarn again single_crochet x 2 this will bring a with white yarn and a slip knot already on your hook join you to the window section fpsc x 6 along the white edge the white yarn by making a fpsc around the post of the next single_crochet x 9 into the remaining st s of round 11 remembering to st to do this insert your hook from front to back into the skip the st at the base of the window that already contains a first st of round 6 then insert it from back to front into the slip_stitch 17 second st of round 6 make a single_crochet make 6 more fpsc s chain 1 and turn 7 13-14 single_crochet x 17 17 b single_crochet x 7 working into the 7 st s of row a chain 1 and turn the 15 short row single_crochet x 9 slip_stitch in the next 2 st s and turn 9 last st might be a bit tricky to get into 7 16 short row skip the first 2 st s the slip_stitch s single_crochet x 7 slip_stitch in c single_crochet x 7 chain 1 and bind off 7 the next 2 st s and turn stuff the car 7 7 now take up the coloured yarn again continuing on where 17 short row skip the first 2 st s single_crochet x 7 chain 1 and turn 7 you left off at the end of round 6 single_crochet in the first st the st 18 fold the boot of the car flat with the hook on the fold and that already contains the first fpsc working into the row slip_stitch through both layers into the next 7 st s chain 1 and bind of the window single_crochet x 2 up the side of the window single_crochet increase in off the first st of row c window single_crochet x 5 working into each st of row c single_crochet increase in the last st of row c single_crochet x 2 down the other photos 32 33 and 34 illustrate what your car should look like now side of the window working into each row as before single_crochet now work away your tails and sew your wheels of choice to the into the st at the base of the window the one right next to sides of the car if you are attaching crochet wheels only sew the the fpsc single_crochet x 10 into the remaining st s of round 6 25 top half of the wheel to the car otherwise your wheels will curve 8 single_crochet x 4 this will bring you to the top of the window in under the
